name: Mental Barrier I
text: You put a barrier of mental energy that protects you from harm. This barrier grants you a +4 shield bonus to AC. In addition, you take half damage from mind thrust I and II (reduced to one-quarter on a successful Will save).
text_zh: 你设置了一道精神能量构成的屏障，并以此来保护自己免受伤害。这道屏障使你的AC获得+4盾牌加值。此外，心灵戳刺 I（mind thrust I）和II对你造成的伤害减半（即成功通过意志豁免时降低至四分之一）。
